phrases: I do not want to die!
This is why I did not want to come here!
If you want her to live, fork over the cash!
I have a turtle and a hamster who need me!
I am sorry, I am just a temp.
You will want to talk to the banking manager...
This is no time to be playing around.
It is not nice to keep laughing at her...
That is the kind of thing that hurts most...
We have got to take a picture!
That is the first thing you have to say after all this time?
Sis, are you going to do your New Year's Eve broadcast looking like that?
Some friends of yours heard about this relay test and came to talk to you.
Miyake-san, it is been so long!
We have not heard from you for so long, so we were worried.

New Year's Card from Antarctica Time Table Program Introduction Introduce the Syowa Base Post Office Japan's most southern post box by: Shiraishi Yuzuki Recap episode of the girls' Antarctica report by: Shiraishi Yuzuki Messages from Japan to the crew Messages from family members for Tamaki Mari Messages from Hanyu Daisan High School Track Team for Miyake Hinata Messages from the National Institute of Polar Research for the Challenge for Antarctic Crew Introduce life in Antarctica
A Place Further Than the Universe
That is all the extra stuff we needed
brought by DROMLAN from Japan on its way to the new station.
Which means we have everything we need now.
Of course, we will not be able to create an observatory
that can see the stars this year right away.
But a few years from now, if we try for it...
We should go, should not we?
I think that is what everyone wants, at least.
Still... that is the place where Takako died.
It is not safe at all.
I bet Mom's spreading it all over social media right now!
It makes better advertising for the broadcast.
Your only New Year's card is to your manager?
None for your friends from earlier?
Well... they are New Year's cards,
but they will not reach anyone until the boat gets back to Japan anyway.
I am going to hit the can!
She seems a bit stressed out.
so they said they would bring us along for the sea ice and geological testing!
I will prepare the camera, so think about your report!
Do not forget, you said you would do the report!
Do not claim later that you do not want to do it!
That was a test, so it will not cut the mustard.
We did this together three years ago.
Takako-senpai just wanted to do everything.
It is all ice up ahead, so we are digging a hole with steam.
After that, I think we went to RundvAgshetta.
It is a place with exposed rock.
If you ask Nobue-san, she might take you there.
Have not heard from him since Christmas.
The garnet he gave me two years ago...
She is currently unable to talk.
The difference in air temperature is extreme...
It is neat to see it from this angle...
I wonder if we will see an aurora?
But it will not become night
during the time we are here.
Well, my lips get so chapped with the dry air,
but my lip balm is frozen, so it is hard to put on.
It is like your skin is peeling off.
All crew outdoors, please seek shelter in the main building
or a building with emergency rations.
It is not getting better at all.
You should probably give up on it.
Someone asked her earlier if she knew how to play Mahjong...
It sounded fun, so I looked over her shoulder, but...
Hey, how do you read the one that looks like a person next to a five?
Hey, you have got some white ones mixed up in your reserves.
Block List Misato Edit Ayaka Edit Satsuki Edit
Menhon, Double South, Three Dora nets me 16,000 points.
Hey, have you been playing with Takako since you were little?
Not against the daughter of Gin and Takako...
She is probably in the bath.
We got an email from her friends addressed to the base.
National Antarctic Research Center Re: About the broadcast timetable
National Antarctic Research Center (To Miyake Hinata) Hanyu Daisan High School Track Team National Antarctic Research Center Re: About the broadcast timetable
Declare all accounts online Declare all accounts offline Get new mail Link accounts Empty the trash can Empty the spam folder New mailbox New smart mailbox
National Antarctic Research Center Re: About the broadcast timetable
National Antarctic Research Center (To Miyake Hinata) Hanyu Daisan High School Track Team National Antarctic Research Center Re: About the broadcast timetable
He said he would write me every day...
National Antarctic Research Center (To Miyake Hinata) Hanyu Daisan High School Track Team
National Antarctic Research Center Re: About the broadcast timetable
National Antarctic Research Center (To Miyake Hinata) Hanyu Daisan High School Track Team National Antarctic Research Center Re: About the broadcast timetable
you quit the track team and quit school so suddenly
We wish we would said something to the older girls.
We are sorry for leaving you all alone.
National Antarctic Research Center (To Miyake Hinata)
But that was addressed to Hinata-san...
How could you do something like that?
But... but I was worried, so...
You seemed so mad about something, and...
I thought you were hiding something!
Something you were not telling us!
We are sorry for leaving you all alone.
Let me tell you in advance, it is a totally gross story.
I do not want to talk about it, and I hate that you asked me.
In short, it is about why I stopped going to club.
It is the competition, so the fastest people should go.
Your year and stuff does not matter!
But for the third-years, this will be their last competition...
It would be more rude to go easy on them!
Did not you say something to that idiot?
O-Of course... we told her to be more sensitive...
In that instant, nothing mattered to me.
They are the ones to blame.
After I quit, they kept spreading all kinds of rumors to lay the blame on me.
Is that why you quit school?
Then the ones who sent the email are...
They want to talk during the broadcast.
They said they were proud their friend went to Antarctica.
Though mainly, I was thinking Oh, were we friends?
We will set up a tent and antenna down that way.
How long are you going to drag this out?
I do not like being treated this way.
Look, why do you think I came to Antarctica?
I wanted to go to an empty place with no one to tie me down!
Colors and shapes I have never seen before!
We are in a place isolated from everything we know,
a completely different world from where we have been before.
That is what I came here to enjoy!
But it does not mean anything if you are all sad, right?
First, we have got camping to do!
It is like a sci-fi movie, is not it?
In a way, it is the cleanest water on the planet.
and it does not get warm enough to breed bacteria.
YOU-Um... this is Kobuchizawa at RundvAgshetta.
We read you loud and clear.
It is like we are surrounded by cake.
The minute we got there, I want to eat chocolate cake!
It is the best natural water I have ever had!
Kimari-san, you are good at the strangest things.
That is not strange, is it?
Can they see this on the satellites?
We use these so they can check our location on the satellites.
It is not taking it now.
Do not let it bother you.
We even put a plate here.
Especially since it is getting colder.
And now it is time for...
Next time we get hot water going, let us make tamagoyaki!
She did eat a lot of it for breakfast in Singapore!
I am going to collect water.
Sorry I used it all earlier...
Wow, it is freezing when the wind blows.
I could just die right now!
I have been thinking about what I would do in your position.
We are sorry for leaving you all alone.
If someone had treated me so awfully,
then called me up out of the blue, as though nothing happened,
wanting to apologize for the permanent damage they would done...
I could not be okay with it.
Shirase, you are so annoying, the way you keep talking and talking.
I guess I am still scared.
I said your hands were enough, remember?
12/31 Choose Your Own New Year's Soba Tempura Mochi Plain
They are not supposed to be flat noodles!
Ready to roll in ten minutes.
It is proof that you are enjoying Antarctica.
Do you think I will feel better if I forgive them?
If it would make me feel better, I might.
But when I imagine them looking all relieved afterwords, it gets under my skin.
I am a pretty petty person, are not I?
Before we start, may I say one thing?
I beg your pardon, but could you leave Miyake Hinata alone?
You might think Hinata has been holding a grudge against you since she quit school,
that she is been suffering badly.
Maybe you think she spends every day crying,
thinking about what happened to her.
Hinata-chan is having a super, amazing fun time with us!
She is having a really fulfilling trip of the sort you cannot get where you are!
She is taking her steps with us!
Unlike Hinata, I am a real jerk, so I will say it outright.
You cannot live your lives in this halfway state forever!
You hurt someone and made them suffer!
Now you get to live with that!
That is what you get for hurting someone!
That is what you get for hurting my friend!
You think you can come crawling back now?
The year is nearing its end.
Let us bash the bad thoughts away, Hinata-chan!
It is just a drum can.
Okay, let us do the first one together!
A Place Further Than the Universe
